title: Varidata
author: Varidata
content: We are a ISP company running our own datacenter located in APAC region.* E5 Series 25% OFF* E3 Series 15% OFF* Cloud instance 40% OFFBrand new Dell & Supermicro servers, self-managed and 100% confidential.Why choose us?* International routes from 10+ Tier-1 Carriers with redundant network* Easy deployment in 5 mins* 7/24 SupportHong Kong Dedicated Server|   | CPU     | RAM  | Bandwidth | Hard Disk | RAID | IP | Price ||---|---------|------|-----------|-----------|------|----|-------|| 1 | E3-1231(4 core) | 8GB  | 100Mbps   | 1TB HDD   | -    | 5  | $136   || 2 | E5-2620(6 core) | 16GB | 100Mbps   | 2TB HDD   | -    | 5  | $162   |Taiwan Dedicated Server|   | CPU     | RAM  | Bandwidth | Hard Disk | RAID | IP | Price ||---|---------|------|-----------|-----------|------|----|-------|| 1 | E3-1230 | 8GB  | 100Mbps   | 2TB HDD   | -    | 5  | $136   || 2 | 2x4110 Sliver | 32GB | 100Mbps   | 2*2TB HDD   | H740P    | 5  | $276   |Hong Kong Cloud Server|   | CPU     | RAM  | Bandwidth | Hard Disk | TRANSFER | IP | Price ||---|---------|------|-----------|-----------|------|----|-------|| 1 | 1 Core | 2GB  | MAX.500Mbps   | 50GB   | Unlimited    | 1  | $12.67   || 2 | 4 Core | 8GB | MAX.500Mbps   | 500GB  | Unlimited    | 1  | $50.69   |Now you can apply a trial server for testing.Please visit our website: https://www.varidata.com/ for a personalized quotation.
